summary: This is an email from attorney Michael Miller of Steptoe & Johnson LLP transmitting three attached letters related to the criminal case United States v. Jeffrey Epstein. The letters are addressed to the SDNY, the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), and the FBI, and the email discusses service of these requests.

keyFacts: On August 20, 2019, attorney Michael Miller of Steptoe & Johnson LLP transmitted three legal letters related to the criminal case against Jeffrey Epstein.
The letters were addressed to the SDNY (Southern District of New York), the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), and the FBI.
The email discusses the procedural step of serving these requests on the MCC and FBI, offering the primary recipients the option to accept service for all three.
The correspondence indicates active legal defense efforts on behalf of Jeffrey Epstein shortly after his arrest in July 2019 and prior to his death in August 2019.
